edu.cmu.lti.f14.hw3.hw3_josephc1.utils
Class Similarity

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.lti.f14.hw3.hw3_josephc1.utils.Similarity

public class Similarity
extends java.lang.Object

A class with a private constructor and only static public functions that ranks the documents using different strategies.

Author:
josephcc

computeOkapiBM25Score

public static double computeOkapiBM25Score(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> queryVector,
                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> docVector,

                                           double k,

Given two sparse matrixes, calculate the cosine similarity

Parameters:
queryVector - the first matrix
docVector - the second matrix
queryId - the queryId for finding the corresponding corpus
k - the k parameter in the BM25 formula
b - the b parameter in the BM25 formula
Returns:
the Okapi BM25 score
